console.log("Beta balance:", ethers.formatEther(betaBalance));
console.log("Alpha balance:", ethers.formatEther(alphaBalance));
const betaBalance = await Beta.balanceOf(await pool.getAddress());
const alphaBalance = await Alpha.balanceOf(await pool.getAddress());
console.log("Pool address:", await pool.getAddress());
console.log("Beta address:", await Beta.getAddress());
console.log("Alpha address:", await Alpha.getAddress());

const Pool = await hre.ethers.getContractFactory("Pool");
